title: jess bowl
ingredients: neutral oil; I prefer avocado oil
2 delicata squash; cut into half moons
8 oz crimini mushrooms; stems removed and washed, cut in half
soy sauce or tamari to taste
instructions: Cook rice in a rice cooker on brown setting or on the stove.
Heat oven to 400°F. Peel sweet potatoes and cut into 3/4" cubes. Toss in a 1–2 Tbsp neutral oil with a
While potatoes and squash are cooking, heat a pan to medium-low heat. Add 2 Tbsp neutral oil and crimini mushrooms
Prepare bowls. Before adding vegetables, mix a dash of toasted sesame oil into the cooked rice. Pile on vegetables
notes: Best rice bowl ever (says Jess). Rice can be cooked on a timer so that it can soak for longer, up to 12 hours.
